title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 905.3 - Criteria for eligible professions requiring the use of body armor
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 905.3 - Criteria for eligible professions requiring the use of body armor

State Regulations
A profession shall be deemed eligible by the department if
the duties of the profession may expose an individual engaged in such
profession to serious physical injury that may be prevented or mitigated by the
wearing of body armor, or if the duties of the profession are necessary to
facilitate the lawful purchase, sale, or use of body armor. Notes

York State Register November 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 48, eff. 11/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
